channel.title: Important Question
channel.description: hi, i can only get the cache to load if its in the client, not downloading, does that mean i cant make a webclient? or can i still do it? if so how?

item.title: Important Question
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“dawgs007, post:3, topic:383485”][quote author=Travas link=topic=479261.msg3508740#msg3508740 date=1298388537]
You can make the cache read from anywhere, you just need to change the directory inside the client. If your going to make a webclient, use Ric’s webclient tutorial in the client hacking section. He goes through every step. Also, if you have any more questions about the cache, or you need help with a webclient, please post in the client help section.
[/quote] Please get on MSN, I still haven’t been helped[/quote]
I’ll be on soon.

Read full topic
